cheatsheet.title: UMP - Update and Maintenance Process Task

intro.description: The objective of this task is to deploy releases into production and establish effective use of the service in order to deliver value to the customer and be able to handover to service operations.

item.title: UMP.A1 - Planning the releases.
item.description: It is important to develop release and deployment plans in order to avoid problems or an uncontrolled impact. The actions to be carried out in this activity are to analyse the situation and to define the release strategy to build, test and maintain the application

item.title: UMP.A2 - Build and test the release
item.description: This activity should be composed by the following actions: a) Usage of build and test environments , b) Take into account standardization and integration aspects , c) Record the complete record of the build so that can be rebuilt if required, d) Maintain evidence of testing e) Check that security requirements are met

item.title: UMP. A3 - Release testing and pilot
item.description: This activity should be composed by the following actions: 1.- Determine whether a service and its underlying service assets can be release into the production environment, the first time and subsequent deployments. 2.- Ensure that business processes, customer, user and service provider interface are capable of using the service properly. 3.- Ensure that service teams are capable of operating the service

item.title: UMP. A4 - Perform transfer, deployment and retirement
item.description: The objective of this activity is to have ready all the aspects that could be modified due to the changes in the new releases. Some of the actions should be: a) Transfer financial assets, b) Transfer business organization, c ) deploy processes and materials , d) deploy and publish the processes and materials ready for people involved in the business

item.title: UMP. A5 - Verify, review and close deployment
item.description: The objective of this activity is to verify and review that all the requirements of this release are included and work correctly and close this releases and its deployment
